EMAILPASSWORDSENT: A reset password link has been sent to your email. Please follow the instruction to reset your password
ENTERSSNLABEL: Enter your SSN Health Care ID:
ERRORANSWERNOTMATCH: Answer does not match our records
ERRORCONTACTINGHOSPITAL: Error contacting the hospital. Try again later
ERRORINCORRECTSSN: The SSN enter does not much our records, try again
FEEDBACK_MESSAGE: Your feedback is invaluable to us. Please take a moment to let us know what you think about Opal!
INTERNETERROR: Sever error, please check your internet connection
LEAVING_APP2: Note that you are leaving the app to an external website.
LIMITS_EXCEEDED: Password tries exceeded, try resetting your password
PASSWORDSERVERERROR: There seems to be an issue on our end regarding your password. This could be due to a password reset that wasn't finalized correctly
PASSWORDRESETSERVERERROR: There seems to be an issue on our end regarding resetting your password. Please try resetting your password again. We apologize for any inconvenience.
PASSWORDSUCCESSRESET: Password has been successfully changed, redirecting to login
REPORTBUGS_MESSAGE: Your bug report is invaluable to us. Please take a moment to report a bug in Opal!
REPORTBUGS_RECEIVED: Your bug report has been received.
RESETINSTRUCTIONS: Password must be at least 6 characters long and must include one letter and one number
RESETTRUSTEDMESSAGE: It seems like you reset your password on a different device. Please set this phone to 'Untrusted' to clear your saved user data before logging in again. You will be able to set as 'Trusted' next time you try to login.
RETRYRESETMESSAGE: Your password reset code was invalid. Please try resetting your password again.
SCREENSHOTTAKEN: Screenshot taken. If it was not you, then exit the app.
SECURE_PHONE: Remember to secure your information by protecting your phone with a passphrase!
SIGNINDIFFERENTACCOUNT: Sign in with a different account
TOUR_WELCOME_DESC: You can find all your radiotherapy data through this app. To get started, click on the arrow to change slide.
TOUR_HOME: In your Home tab, you will be provided with news about your medical status, documents and appointments.
TOUR_MYCHART: In your My Chart tab, you can see your appointments, documents and any other chart information.
TOUR_GENERAL: In your General tab, you can see your treating team, announcements and parking. You can also provide us feedback on the app!
TOUR_EDUCATION: In your Education tab, you will receive educational material as you progress through your radiotherapy. We will show you videos, booklets and documents specific to you.
TOUR_INFO: The Information button will give you any extra information if you need it! Press 'Close' if you want to exit the tour or you can press the left arrow to see the previous tips.
UPDATEMESSAGE: There is a security patch available for Opal App and for your safety it must be installed before continuing use.
TRUST_DEVICE: Set this device as a trusted device?
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS: Too many login attempts. Please try again later.
NEWPASSWORDVALIDATION: Password must be at least 6 characters long and must include one letter and one number!
OUTOFTRIES: Too many failed attempts - This account will be locked out for 5 minutes.
UNATTENDED: Do not leave your phone unattended.
